A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful film\, just awful. Rian Johnson is an arrogent duchebag who has thrown aside years of myth to do 'his own thing'. Wouldn't be so bad if it was actually a good thing\, but this is just trash\, superman Leia was an epic fail\, making Luke out to be a hobo coward who tried to kill his own nephew in his sleep after fighting to save Darth Vader makes no sense at all\, killing Snoke with no back story was a mistake\, same one made in.the phantom menace with Darth maul\, showing Rey to be a nobody was a bad joke. This film just doesn't feel like star wars at all\, completely the wrong tone. The problem is\, the movie has so many political references in it that I suspect reviewers have felt obliged to give it a thumbs up.
